sentence: Reps. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) and Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.), among others, joined Collins for a campaign event last month and cast him as someone who would govern in their image.
title: Cuellar in danger as Texas primary votes roll in

sentence: Congressional Republicans are fuming after Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., claimed some lawmakers have invited him to sex parties and have used cocaine in front of him without offering any specifics.
